languages.text: Whenever an enemy in a 4-cell radius around the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect, the Executioner regains +{uip|Heal|dd71e8c8913441fd96e0a30ad7c757e3} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each time an enemy in 4 cells to Executioner suffers damage from a DoT effect, Executioner heals {uip|Heal|dd71e8c8913441fd96e0a30ad7c757e3} wounds.
